dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Web site and name infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 01, 2005 1:47 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Web site and name infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Web site and name infringement
Date: Thu, 1 Dec 2005 11:55:23 -0700
From: Nelnet Communications <NelnetCommunications@nelnet.net>
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com' <abuse@theplanet.com>

To Whom It May Concern:



Nelnet, Inc. ("Nelnet") is the owner of the federally registered trademark
"NELNET" Reg. # 2510521.  It has come to our attention recently that a Web
site hosted by your company, located at the url
www.nelnet.collegeplanning.net is using the Nelnet trademark as a purported
link to "Student Loan," "College," and "College Planning," among other
related links,  when in reality a user selecting that link is redirected to
page with numerous links on it, thus giving the user the impression of an
affiliation between those organizations and Nelnet, which do not exist, and
in turn diverting business away from Nelnet.



This use of the Nelnet trademark is unauthorized and deceptive and likely to
create confusion among consumers.  Accordingly, we are writing to inform you
of this unauthorized use.



Because these activities are clear violations of your organizations' Terms
of Use and Acceptable Use policies, we request your cooperation in demanding
that you cease and desist this activity.



Please contact the undersigned on or before December 15, 2005 to advise us
of your intended actions.  If we do not receive your response we will
proceed to exercise all rights and remedies available to us with all due
haste.  You may contact me at:



          Nelnet Corporation

          3015 S. Parker Road, Suite 400

          Aurora, CO 80014

          (303) 696 5405



Thank you for your attention to this important matter.



Sincerely,

Kari E. Kelly

Legal Counsel

Nelnet, Inc.







- ------------------------------------------------------------
The information contained in this message is confidential proprietary
property of Nelnet, Inc. and its affiliated companies (Nelnet) and is
intended for the recipient only.
Any reproduction, forwarding, or copying without the express permission of
Nelnet is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in
error, please notify us immediately by replying to this e-mail.
- ------------------------------------------------------------



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----

Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
